sense.def:
To stimulate something
pomeni nekaj spodbuditi, da se začne ali naprej razvija.

seg.quote: Rising prices will stimulate demands for higher incomes.
An outsider who may stimulate new ideas.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
stimulates someone
, nekomu vzbudi občutek, da je poln zamisli in navdušenja.

seg.quote: ...a conversation which I found both stimulating and exciting.
I find great intellectual stimulation in these surroundings.
The optical system of the eye stimulates cells in the retina.
